fields.name: image
fields.label: Profile picture
fields.description: Picture of teacher. If left blank a placeholder image will be displayed. Image dimensions should ideally be 150px by 150px to avoid scaling.

fields.name: iwi
fields.label: Iwi/hapū
fields.description: Enter one or more iwi/hapū, or leave blank to not display this field for this teacher.

fields.name: role
fields.label: Role
fields.description: Role of teacher e.g. Course Coordinator, Tutor

fields.name: office
fields.label: Office
fields.description: Office location and number. Leave blank to not display this field for this teacher.

fields.name: officebuilding
fields.label: Building
fields.description: Office building. Leave blank to not display this field for this teacher.

fields.name: officecampus
fields.label: Campus
fields.description: Office campus. Leave blank to not display this field for this teacher.

fields.name: officehours
fields.label: Office Hours
fields.description: Office Hours. Leave blank to not display this field for this teacher.

fields.name: phone
fields.label: Phone
fields.description: Contact phone number or extension. Leave blank to not display this field for this teacher.

fields.name: email
fields.label: Email
fields.description: Email address.  Displayed as a clickable link. Leave blank to not display this field for this teacher.

fields.name: shortbio
fields.label: Short biography
fields.description: Short biography.  Two or three lines is the recommended maximum. Leave blank to not display this field for this teacher.

fields.name: link
fields.label: Link
fields.description: A link to further information for this teacher. If present, a "More..." link will be displayed after the teacher details. Leave blank to not use the feature for this teacher.

options.label: Auto - Three columns, or two columns if four or less items.
